channel.title: D&D Combat Simulator for other systems?
channel.description:
So while I wrote a 5th edition D&D Combat Simulator (https://dndcombat.com)
What other systems (Pathfinder seems obvious) do you think would benefit from such a tool?
I plan on doing 2nd edition since I grew up with that one but do you think there are any OSR systems that would be fun with it or are they all a little niche/combat too simple.
